archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Sales Prospect
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Initiate interaction with a sales prospect, analyzes a prospect's needs and identifies potential solutions for them.

properties.value: Develop Sales Prospect initiates contact with a sales prospect to acknowledge their interest via the Customer or Party Interaction Management process. It also analyzes a prospect's needs and identifies one or more potential product offerings for them. Offerings may expand or change any suggested product offerings that have already been provided to them.
